title: If you dodge with low priority queue. your punishment wait time is 40 minutes.
body: great. really? did you guys really do this few months ago and not say a word about it? really?

replies.body: Good, now bring it to all queues.

For some reason i assume the need to dodge was not because there was an emergency that popped up that would take longer than a few minutes or to get into a game with a friend who wanted to wait the 20 minutes.
Put this in normal aram queue pls
